MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn, affecting properties in Rutland Street, Ashridge Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.05am. Our engineers are on site and confirmed a fault on the underground cable network. Due to the repairs required we now expect your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.11am on 13th of March 2021
